description:
Fuyuki thinks the house has poltergeists.  Keroro thinks it`s something much more scary than that: the alien race Spectronians, who will devour them!  And then Keroro forces everyone to star in his weird script for a superhero show!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi & Fuyuki Stay with the Devilish Hyuga Family / Keroro Turns into Super Hero!
Un démon chez les Monaté / Jouons aux superhéros
冬樹&夏美 悪魔のすむ日向家 であります / ケロロ なれ! スーパーヒーローに であります
